scripts.build-all-all: npm run build-all-linux && npm run build-all-win
scripts.build-all-linux: npm run build-linux && npm run pack-linux && npm run linux-installer && npm run zip-linux
scripts.build-all-win: npm run build-win && npm run pack-win && npm run zip-win
scripts.pack-linux: asar pack Hachidori-linux-x64/resources/app Hachidori-linux-x64/resources/app.asar && rm -rf Hachidori-linux-x64/resources/app
scripts.pack-win: asar pack Hachidori-win32-x64/resources/app Hachidori-win32-x64/resources/app.asar && rm -rf Hachidori-win32-x64/resources/app
scripts.linux-installer: cp INSTALL.sh Hachidori-linux-x64/ && cp hachidori.desktop Hachidori-linux-x64/ && cp images/hachidori.png Hachidori-linux-x64/
